org.openbel.framework.tools
Class PhaseApplication

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.core.CommandLineApplication
      org.openbel.framework.tools.PhaseApplication
Direct Known Subclasses:
PhaseFourApplication, PhaseOneApplication, PhaseThreeApplication, PhaseTwoApplication
public abstract class PhaseApplication
extends CommandLineApplication

Base class for BEL phase compilers.
